about_the_game:
In the near future, Earth has fallen into an apocalyptic state due to war and ecological collapse. Genetic mutations and biological modifications have given rise to various new species, all struggling to survive in a resource-scarce environment. You are a survivor, waking up beneath a massive tree with no memory of your past. Faced with hostile races and the harsh natural world, you must quickly adapt, assemble a team, gather resources, and devise survival strategies as you embark on a journey to save the world.

Open World

In this game, players will immerse themselves in a vast open world, exploring various environments and locations. From dense forests to swampy lakes, each area features its own unique tribes and ecosystems. The open-world design allows you to freely choose your exploration routes, uncover hidden quests, secrets, and challenges.It not only enhances the immersion of the game but also ensures that each player's experience is truly unique.

Subsist

Survival is one of the core elements of the game. You must constantly search for food, water, and other resources to sustain your life and keep your camp operational. In a post-apocalyptic environment where resources are scarce, careful management of supplies is essential to balance needs and risks. Facing harsh weather and hostile creatures, it is crucial to strategically plan your actions.

Strategy

In the game, strategy is essential. You need to assess the environment, analyze your enemies, and formulate effective plans to tackle various challenges. Whether it's assembling a team, choosing the right weapons, or deciding when to attack or retreat, every decision will impact the outcome of battles and the acquisition of resources. By flexibly applying strategy, you can stand out in the fiercely competitive survival environment and achieve victory.

Rich character images

In this game, you will encounter a diverse array of character designs, encompassing three major categories of magical creatures and their 12 sub-classes. By enhancing your affinity, you can forge alliances, hire companions, or capture creatures to fight alongside you. Each powerful elite unit has a unique backstory and is willing to sacrifice themselves, undergoing modifications to become formidable warriors who assist you in overcoming challenges in a perilous adventure. Utilize these creatures' abilities to strategically build your team and explore the unknown world.

Plot Participation

Every choice you make will affect the development of the story and the fate of the characters, leading to different narrative branches and endings. Through interactions with NPCs, completing quests, and facing moral dilemmas, you will immerse yourself in the game's plot. Each decision not only alters the current situation but also leaves a lasting impact throughout the entire game.

Biomodification

Biological modification is a major highlight of the game, allowing players to personalize the characters in their team by collecting equipment and materials. This not only significantly enhances the characters' combat abilities but also alters their appearance, granting them new skills and traits. Each modification introduces unique visual effects and combat strategies, making the characters more distinctive and powerful in battle.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content unsuitable for all ages, featuring general adult themes including violence, blood, mild nudity, or suggestive elements. The game is set in a post-apocalyptic world where players assume the role of a survivor and use weapons like swords, axes, and spears to defeat enemies. Combat scenes may include blood-splatter effects when characters are injured or killed. Some characters are depicted smoking or drinking, which introduces occasional use of tobacco or alcohol-related elements. Additionally, certain characters wear revealing clothing to emphasize personality traits; however, there is no explicit nudity or direct depiction of sexual activity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card (integrated or dedicated with min 512MB memory)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit), Windows 11(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD 1800 equivalent
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In this open-world survival strategy game, you are a survivor in a post-apocalyptic world. Explore a vast map to find food, water, and resources to sustain your camp. When facing various antagonists, use strategy to assemble a powerful team. Every decision you make will impact the characters' fates.
